channel.title: Ravin's tiny blog.
channel.description: Sharing things that flow through my mind.

item.title: I started blogging today.
item.description: This is my first post on my new tiny blog! How exciting! I’m sure I’ll write a lot more interesting things in the future.
item.content:encoded: This is my first post on my new tiny blog! How exciting! I’m sure I’ll write a lot more interesting things in the future.
